publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1395 Dr Richard Simpson: Medical Research in Scotland—That the Parliament, recognising the importance of current medical research into biomedical markers, translational research, which can predict the development of illness, welcomes the £15.5 million of new funding given by Wyeth Pharmaceuticals Inc. to the Translational Medicine Research Collaboration of Scottish University Medical Schools as further evidence of the outstanding quality of medical research in Scotland.
